objects.description: The net user username \password and net user username \password \domain commands in Net can be used to create a local or domain account respectively.

external_references.description: Savill, J. (1999, March 4). Net.exe reference. Retrieved September 22, 2015.

objects.x_mitre_detection: The net user username \password and net user username \password \domain commands in {{LinkById|S0039}} can be used to create a local or domain account respectively.
